conbody.p: The oxy_unescapeURLValue() function returns the un-escaped value of an URL-like string given as a parameter. For example if the value contains %20 it will be converted to a simple space character.
conbody.example: oxy_unescapeURLValue("http://www.example.com/a%20simple%20example.html") returns the http://www.example.com/a simple example.html value.
